channel.title: How to set player death respawn point? HELP!
channel.description: How do you set the player death respawn point? Thanks, my server's taking shape... :)

item.title: How to set player death respawn point? HELP!

}
} catch(Exception e) { }
}

//teleportToY = 3684;
//pEmote = 15;
//pWalk = 13;
sendMessage(“Oh no! You died!”);

hitDiff = 0;
updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}

    }
